X

Xdg - Class in com.amonson.xdg
Class used to open files based loosely on the XDG specification.
Xdg() - Constructor for class com.amonson.xdg.Xdg
Create a non-specific version of the Xdg class that will not use a application name as a subfolder.
Xdg(String) - Constructor for class com.amonson.xdg.Xdg
Create a specific version of the Xdg class that will use a application name as a subfolder.
